001
002package com.commercetools.http.apachehttp;
003
004import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
010import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
011import java.util.function.Supplier;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
014
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
016
017import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
018import org.apache.commons.io.input.AutoCloseInputStream;
019import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleBody;
020import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleHttpResponse;
021import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleResponseConsumer;
022import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.CloseableHttpAsyncClient;
023import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.HttpAsyncClientBuilder;
024import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.nio.PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder;
025import org.apache.hc.client5.http.nio.AsyncClientConnectionManager;
026import org.apache.hc.client5.http.ssl.ClientTlsStrategyBuilder;
027import org.apache.hc.core5.http.ContentType;
028import org.apache.hc.core5.http.Header;
029import org.apache.hc.core5.http.HttpHeaders;
030import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.AsyncRequestProducer;
031import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.ssl.TlsStrategy;
032import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.support.AsyncRequestBuilder;
033import org.apache.hc.core5.http2.HttpVersionPolicy;
034import org.apache.hc.core5.reactor.IOReactorStatus;
035import org.apache.hc.core5.reactor.ssl.TlsDetails;
036
037public class CtApacheHttpClient extends HttpClientBase {
038    public static final int MAX_REQUESTS = 64;
039
040    private final CloseableHttpAsyncClient apacheHttpClient;
041
042    private final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> clientBuilder = CtApacheHttpClient::createClientBuilder;
043
044    public static HttpAsyncClientBuilder createClientBuilder() {
045        return createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS).build());
046    }
047
048    public static HttpAsyncClientBuilder createClientBuilder(AsyncClientConnectionManager cm) {
049        return HttpAsyncClientBuilder.create().setVersionPolicy(HttpVersionPolicy.NEGOTIATE).setConnectionManager(cm);
050    }
051
052    public static PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder createConnectionManager(final int maxConnTotal,
053            final int maxConnPerRoute) {
054        final TlsStrategy tlsStrategy = ClientTlsStrategyBuilder.create()
055                .useSystemProperties()
056                .setTlsDetailsFactory(
057                    sslEngine -> new TlsDetails(sslEngine.getSession(), sslEngine.getApplicationProtocol()))
058                .build();
059        return PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder.create()
060                .setMaxConnPerRoute(maxConnPerRoute)
061                .setMaxConnTotal(maxConnTotal)
062                .setTlsStrategy(tlsStrategy);
063    }
064
065    private void init() {
066        if (!(apacheHttpClient.getStatus() == IOReactorStatus.ACTIVE)) {
067            apacheHttpClient.start();
068        }
069    }
070
071    public CtApacheHttpClient() {
072        super();
073        apacheHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
074        init();
075    }
076
077    public CtApacheHttpClient(final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute) {
078        super();
079        apacheHttpClient = createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()).build();
080        init();
081    }
082
083    public CtApacheHttpClient(final BuilderOptions options) {
084        super();
085        apacheHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
086        init();
087    }
088
089    public CtApacheHttpClient(final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute, final BuilderOptions options) {
090        super();
091        apacheHttpClient = options
092                .plus(createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()))
093                .build();
094        init();
095    }
096
097    public CtApacheHttpClient(final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> builderSupplier) {
098        super();
099        apacheHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
100        init();
101    }
102
103    public CtApacheHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor) {
104        super(executor);
105        apacheHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
106        init();
107    }
108
109    public CtApacheHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute) {
110        super(executor);
111        apacheHttpClient = createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()).build();
112        init();
113    }
114
115    public CtApacheHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final BuilderOptions options) {
116        super(executor);
117        apacheHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
118        init();
119    }
120
121    public CtApacheHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute,
122            final BuilderOptions options) {
123        super(executor);
124        apacheHttpClient = options
125                .plus(createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()))
126                .build();
127        init();
128    }
129
130    public CtApacheHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> builderSupplier) {
131        super(executor);
132        apacheHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
133        init();
134    }
135
136    private AsyncRequestProducer toApacheRequest(final ApiHttpRequest httpRequest) {
137        final String method = httpRequest.getMethod().toString();
138        final AsyncRequestBuilder builder = AsyncRequestBuilder.create(method);
139        builder.setUri(httpRequest.getUri());
140        httpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders().forEach((entry) -> builder.addHeader(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));
141
142        if (httpRequest.getBody() != null) {
143            //default media type is JSON, if other media type is set as a header, use it
144            ContentType mediaType = ContentType.APPLICATION_JSON.withCharset(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
145            if (httpRequest.getHeaders()
146                    .getHeaders()
147                    .stream()
148                    .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE))) {
149                mediaType = ContentType
150                        .parse(Objects.requireNonNull(httpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
151            }
152
153            builder.setEntity(httpRequest.getBody(), mediaType);
154        }
155        return builder.build();
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
160        final CompletableFuture<SimpleHttpResponse> apacheResponseFuture = new CompletableFuture<>();
161        apacheHttpClient.execute(toApacheRequest(request), SimpleResponseConsumer.create(),
162            new CompletableFutureCallbackAdapter<>(apacheResponseFuture));
163        return apacheResponseFuture.thenApplyAsync(CtApacheHttpClient::toResponse, executor());
164    }
165
166    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final SimpleHttpResponse response) {
167        final Map<String, List<Header>> apacheHeaders = Arrays.stream(response.getHeaders())
168                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(Header::getName));
169
170        final ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(apacheHeaders.entrySet()
171                .stream()
172                .flatMap(
173                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value.getValue())))
174                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
175
176        final byte[] bodyNullable = Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody()).map((SimpleBody entity) -> {
177            try {
178                final boolean gzipEncoded = Optional.ofNullable(response.getFirstHeader(HttpHeaders.CONTENT_ENCODING))
179                        .map(Header::getValue)
180                        .map(v -> v.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"))
181                        .orElse(false);
182                final InputStream body = new ByteArrayInputStream(entity.getBodyBytes());
183                final InputStream content = gzipEncoded ? new GZIPInputStream(body) : body;
184                final AutoCloseInputStream autoCloseInputStream = new AutoCloseInputStream(content);
185                return IOUtils.toByteArray(autoCloseInputStream);
186            }
187            catch (final IOException e) {
188                throw new HttpException(e);
189            }
190        }).orElse(null);
191
192        return new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.getCode(), apiHttpHeaders, bodyNullable, response.getReasonPhrase());
193    }
194
195    @Override
196    public void closeDelegate() throws Exception {
197        apacheHttpClient.close();
198    }
199}
